member.name: _SVGIO
member.summary: Used with the , , and methods to restrict or control the items in their collections.

member.name: _SVGIO.SVGIO_BACKGROUND
member.summary: 0x00000000. Refers to the background of the view. It is used with IID_IContextMenu to get a shortcut menu for the view background and with IID_IDispatch to get a dispatch interface that represents the ShellFolderView object for the view.

member.name: _SVGIO.SVGIO_SELECTION
member.summary: 0x00000001. Refers to the currently selected items. Used with IID_IDataObject to retrieve a data object that represents the selected items.

member.name: _SVGIO.SVGIO_ALLVIEW
member.summary: 0x00000002. Used in the same way as but refers to all items in the view.

member.name: _SVGIO.SVGIO_CHECKED
member.summary: 0x00000003. Used in the same way as but refers to checked items in views where checked mode is supported. For more details on checked mode, see .

member.name: _SVGIO.SVGIO_TYPE_MASK
member.summary: 0x0000000F. Masks all bits but those corresponding to the flags.

member.name: _SVGIO.SVGIO_FLAG_VIEWORDER
member.summary: 0x80000000. Returns the items in the order they appear in the view. If this flag is not set, the selected item will be listed first.
